name: Leon The Cameleon
description:
From the independent development of Federico de Tezanos Pinto (@FedericoDETP) and Manuel gamboa Naon (@manoloidee) from La Plata (Buenos Aires, Argentina, 2014) Leon, a 2D platform game where the main character is a chameleon that can only complete the different levels using his camouflage and avoiding conflict. You have to use your limited amount of abilities and the different power ups to complete the levels!.

- Make sure you have Java installed in your PC.

- There is a level creator you can unlock by compleating the game.

- Credits to teknoaxe @teknoaxe for the music.
